definition: to have no cares/to be carefree
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: A long time ago, a man unencumbered own good uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，自己一个人无牵无挂，好不自在。

sentences.english: My carefree days are over, I fear.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我的无牵无挂的日子已经过去了。

sentences.english: Care free, they roam leisurely in the space.
sentences.chinese: 它们闲游在太空，无牵无挂。

sentences.english: JK: Yeah, you guys are just homeless team.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，你们是一个无牵无挂的团队。

definition: to be all alone in the world
free and at leisure (idiom); unfettered/outside the reach of the law (of criminal)/at large
free and easy (idiom); carefree/leisurely
worry
to roam far and wide (idiom)/to travel the world
free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
carefree and without worries (idiom)
to regard the four corners of the world all as home (idiom)/to feel at home anywhere/to roam about unconstrained/to consider the entire country, or world, to be one's own
one who is cut off from others (idiom)/one who has chosen to follow a solitary path/(can also be an indirect way of referring to an unmarried person)
solitary and impoverished (idiom)
to roam far and wide/to drift with the wind
no one to rely on (idiom); on one's own/orphaned/left to one's own devices
to implicate/to involve
burden
all by oneself/all alone
at home wherever one is (idiom); ready to adapt/flexible/to accept circumstances with good will
to bind/to yoke/to impede
